TopicTitle: The Student Administered Board for the Study of the Intent to Inhabit Space

Articles.Content:
Fellow Dreams of Kerbin,

A stand before you a student. I would say just a student, but a wise man once told me to never say that. He said the student is not something to be ashamed of, but proud of for the student brings life and energy and new prospective. For this reason, I, DrBurst am please to announce The Student Administered Board for the Study of the Intent to Inhabit Space. I will use to skills I learn my my mechanical engineering classes and show the whole community the equations behind the art of spaceflight.

Welcome to the forums
